ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3'' SONY CCD, Color DSP. 420 Horizontal Resolution TV Lines
20 IR leds for night vision; 0 Lux ( IR LED ON). Built in f3.6mm lens
Weatherproof Housing for outdoor indoor application
Built-in Microphone and Audio Circuit. Cable through bracket protects the camera from vandalism
Package including: 2 of Sony CCD security cameras, 2 of 12V DC 500mA power supplies and 2 of security warning stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 Pack of Built-in Sony Color CCD IR Outdoor Day Night Vision CCTV Audio Security Cameras Weatherproof 3.6mm Wide Angle View Lens 20 Infrared LEDs for Home DVR Surveillance System with Power Supplies and Free Security Warning Decals WH4
